video.title: Crime Patrol
video.synopsis: This reality crime series follows Indian authorities in great detail as they investigate prominent cases and close in on the suspects.

episodes.synopsis: Mashima is found murdered shortly after telling her husband about a young man named Amjad's inappropriate behavior toward her.
episodes.title: Doctor Samar takes the initiative

episodes.synopsis: When Jagan Kora is murdered in his own home, police immediately suspect Myra, his maid. But Myra reveals a secret that sheds new light on the case.
episodes.title: Well Planned Murder of Jagan Kora

episodes.synopsis: Soon after her parents file a missing persons report on their daughter, her body is found. But was her death an accident or foul play?
episodes.title: Jyoti gets killed for eyeing a boy

episodes.synopsis: A boy disappears from a respected hospital just as the doctor who owns another facility arranges to sell a male child to a widow.
episodes.title: Child Trafficking

episodes.synopsis: When Naresh, an upper-level manager with a government agency, is found stabbed to death in his car, evidence points to a temporary employee.
episodes.title: The Mystery Woman in the Car

episodes.synopsis: Priya, a young woman with dreams of stardom, commits suicide when a smooth-talking man manipulates her with promises of a big break.
episodes.title: Glamour Struck

episodes.synopsis: Troubled Rajendra often leaves home for days at a time, but he always returns. Now he's failed to come back, and his son suspects foul play.
episodes.title: Some died that day

episodes.synopsis: A student is shot to death by an unknown assailant. Was it the girl seen arguing with her, or the two men she later ran away with?
episodes.title: Love Gone Awry

episodes.synopsis: When a man is shot at point-blank range during his wedding, no one in attendance seems to know the killer or why he committed the crime.
episodes.title: Tragedy at a Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Young Raju is kidnapped while running a simple errand, and police suspect that someone close to the boy is responsible.
episodes.title: High Stakes

episodes.synopsis: An eyewitness provides police with details when four men kidnap a young woman in broad daylight, but will the authorities find her in time?
episodes.title: Abducted

episodes.synopsis: When a man's body is found in his car and evidence is scant, police are stumped until they search the dead man's laptop.
episodes.title: Is It Love?

episodes.synopsis: Authorities launch an investigation when Jyoti and her father-in-law, Baburao, are in a suspicious car accident.
episodes.title: A Compromise

episodes.synopsis: Chanda is a maid who'll do anything to ensure that her children get the education she never received. But how far will she go to pay for it?
episodes.title: A Child's Fees

episodes.synopsis: Purvi, who's grown up amid the degradation of a Mumbai brothel, hopes to turn her life around when she receives a scholarship from the U.S.
episodes.title: Rising

episodes.synopsis: A traumatized young woman shows up at the police station claiming that a man sexually assaulted her, but the suspect claims that she's lying.
episodes.title: A Devilish Plot

episodes.synopsis: When two men are robbed on their way to complete a real estate transaction, police believe the crime may be a well-planned inside job.
episodes.title: The Loot

episodes.synopsis: To help her impoverished family, 13-year-old Shalini takes a job in Delhi keeping house for a doctor who begins physically abusing her.
episodes.title: Exploited

episodes.synopsis: When a group of ladies gets together at a hotel for a friendly game of cards, one of them is shot in the head by an unseen sniper.
episodes.title: A Shot in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Dinanath, a postman with an impeccable track record, is arrested after being accused of stealing a paltry amount of money.
episodes.title: And justice for all

episodes.synopsis: Saira's father is found brutally murdered shortly after refusing to bail her husband, Altaf, out of jail. And now, Saira and Altaf have disappeared.
episodes.title: The Web of Crime

episodes.synopsis: A university official is found murdered shortly after he takes a bribe to guarantee a man's daughter a place in medical school.
episodes.title: Circle of corruption

episodes.synopsis: When young Piyush is abducted while running an errand for his mother, police suspect that someone in his family is responsible.
episodes.title: Personal Wealth

episodes.synopsis: Shortly after Jasmine starts receiving intimidating phone calls from Nadeem, her family and friends begin to distance themselves from her.
episodes.title: Unforseen Enemy

episodes.synopsis: When authorities catch up with hijackers who've overtaken a school bus, the criminals manage to flee with a hostage, 14-year-old student Rajni.
episodes.title: Hijacked

episodes.synopsis: When a woman claims that her landlord raped her, the police must find out if the man is being framed or if he's truly guilty.
episodes.title: The Accused
